archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1200
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to access general information about all products and services (e.g. roaming countries in pack, international minute charges, subscription payments, sign up steps etc.)

properties.value: DS: either product pages with information about the products or special CMS zone / external static page with description delivered by VF Details to be figured out later during both LLD

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
